titles.title: A resolution encouraging the people of the United States to reflect on and remember the integrity and courage of the 6,135 Christian men and women of Poland who acted to save their Jewish countrymen and countrywomen from extermination by Nazi Germany.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: 9/25/2009--Introduced. Encourages the people of the United States to reflect on and remember the integrity and courage of the 6,135 Christian men and women of Poland who acted to save their Jewish countrymen and countrywomen from extermination by Nazi Germany.
